title: Hundreds of curated classes
description: Choose from 700+ classes to match every speed. Our practices range from 5 minutes to 90 minutes and are designed to easily fit in with your routine and rituals

title: A highly trained global community of teachers
description: Practice with our teachers from Melbourne, Sydney, New York and beyond.

title: Immersive workshops
description: Take your practice deeper with our specialised workshops and collections.

title: New classes each week
description: Enjoy new content every week alongside our library of hundreds of classes. New releases drop every Monday.
